thread.title: Goldsmith warns supporters of tough battle for City Hall
thread.title_full: Goldsmith warns supporters of tough battle for City Hall | London - ITV News

author: Simon Harris
title: Goldsmith warns supporters of tough battle for City Hall
text:
Zac Goldsmith warned Tory party supporters last night of a tough battle ahead to stop Labour taking control of City Hall.
The Richmond Park MP was making his first speech since winning the contest to be Conservative candidate for mayor in next May's election.
Goldsmith was addressing members of Conservative Future, the party's youth wing, at a conference fringe event in Manchester.
He described Labour as a "powerful fighting force" and admitted the Tories were behind.
Anyone who's tempted to believe the Labour party is weak at this moment I think needs to think again. We know that hundreds of thousands of people have signed up to join their campaign, many of them in London. We know that we are up against it. We've got our work cut out because frankly, numerically, mathematically we start behind.
â€“ Zac Goldsmith MP Goldsmith will join Boris Johnson on stage at the Conservative conference later today.
Last updated Tue 6 Oct 2015 Politics
